name: @monaco-protocol/event-client
description: Interface package for the Monaco Protocol Events program on Solana
author: Monaco Protocol

scripts.generatePackage: npm run build && npm pack && npm run clean
scripts.publishClient: npm install && npm publish --access public && npm run clean
scripts.publishDevClient: npm install && npm publish --tag dev --access public && npm run clean
scripts.publishRCClient: npm install && npm publish --tag rc --access public && npm run clean
